definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: red colour, vermilion (etym. unknown);—vermilion, formerly gained from kermes insect (vermiculus): [[מָשׁוֹחַ בַּשָּׁשַָׁר]] Je 22:14 (LXXmi/ltov, red ochre; Targum sinopis [from city Sinopis, whence the colour came Plin:NH xxxv. [6] 13], cf. Thatcher:DB COLOURS Canney:EB1D.); [[חֲקֻקִים בַּשָּׁשַָׁר]] Ez Eze 23:14.
